Plot: Set in 1944, Valiant is a woodland pigeon who wants to become a great hero someday. When he hears they are hiring recruits for the Royal Homing Pigeon Service, he immediately sets out for ...
Title: Valiant
Writer: George Webster (story), Jordan Katz (screenplay), George Webster (screenplay), George Melrod (screenplay)
Actors: Ewan McGregor, Ricky Gervais, Tim Curry, Jim Broadbent
tomatoConsensus: Valiant has a good collection of voice talents, but the story is strictly by-the-numbers.
